questions: What is the function of now.timezone(*timezone*), lowercase(*field_name*), uppercase(*field_name*), and datetime.from_timestamp(*field_name*)?
How to get current date and time with given *timezone* info?
How to get lowercased text value of *field_name*?
How to get upper-cased text value of *field_name*?
How to get date and time created from timestamp content of field *field_name*?
answer:
as date and time with *timezone* info
* now.timezone(*timezone*) - returns current date and time with given *timezone* info
* lowercase(*field_name*) - returns lowercased text value of *field_name*
* uppercase(*field_name*) - returns upper-cased text value of *field_name*
* datetime.from_timestamp(*field_name*) - returns date and time created from timestamp content of field *field_name*

### Example of function use

``` title="Example"
datetime.from_timestamp(payload@path.to.data) > datetime.from_timestamp(payload@path.to.time)
```
